description: The AWS::CUR::ReportDefinition resource creates a Cost & Usage Report with user-defined settings. You can use this resource to define settings like time granularity (hourly, daily, monthly), file format (Parquet, CSV), and S3 bucket for delivery of these reports.

ReportName.description: The name of the report that you want to create. The name must be unique, is case sensitive, and can't include spaces.
ReportName.markdownDescription:
The name of the report that you want to create. The name must be unique, is case sensitive, and can't include spaces.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [0-9A-Za-z!\-_.*\'()]+  
Update requires: Replacement

TimeUnit.description: The granularity of the line items in the report.
TimeUnit.markdownDescription:
The granularity of the line items in the report.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HOURLY | DAILY | MONTHLY  
Update requires: Replacement

Format.description: The format that AWS saves the report in.
Format.markdownDescription:
The format that AWS saves the report in.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: textORcsv | Parquet  
Update requires: No interruption

Compression.description: The compression format that AWS uses for the report.
Compression.markdownDescription:
The compression format that AWS uses for the report.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ZIP | GZIP | Parquet  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalSchemaElements.description: A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.

items.description: Whether or not AWS includes resource IDs in the report.
items.markdownDescription:
Whether or not AWS includes resource IDs in the report.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RESOURCES  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalSchemaElements.markdownDescription:
A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

S3Bucket.description: The S3 bucket where AWS delivers the report.
S3Bucket.markdownDescription:
The S3 bucket where AWS delivers the report.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9_\.\-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Prefix.description: The prefix that AWS adds to the report name when AWS delivers the report. Your prefix can't include spaces.
S3Prefix.markdownDescription:
The prefix that AWS adds to the report name when AWS delivers the report. Your prefix can't include spaces.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [0-9A-Za-z!\-_.*\'()/]*  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Region.description: The region of the S3 bucket that AWS delivers the report into.
S3Region.markdownDescription:
The region of the S3 bucket that AWS delivers the report into.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalArtifacts.description: A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.

items.description: The types of manifest that you want AWS to create for this report.
items.markdownDescription:
The types of manifest that you want AWS to create for this report.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: REDSHIFT | QUICKSIGHT | ATHENA  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalArtifacts.markdownDescription:
A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

RefreshClosedReports.description: Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.
RefreshClosedReports.markdownDescription:
Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

ReportVersioning.description: Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.
ReportVersioning.markdownDescription:
Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATE_NEW_REPORT | OVERWRITE_REPORT  
Update requires: Replacement

BillingViewArn.description: The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value by using the billing view service public APIs.
BillingViewArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon resource name of the billing view. You can get this value by using the billing view service public APIs.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: (arn:aws(-cn)?:billing::[0-9]{12}:billingview/)?[a-zA-Z0-9_\+=\.\-@].{1,30}  
Update requires: Replacement
